definition: the five flavors, namely: sweet 甜, sour 酸, bitter 苦, spicy hot 辣, salty 鹹|咸/all kinds of flavors
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription
a complete gamut of all five flavors (idiom); every flavor under the sun

sentences.english: South Schisandra is singly small, flesh thin, looked withered, seeds there is no gloss rough.
sentences.chinese: 而南五味子粒小肉薄顯乾癟，種子粗糙無光澤。

sentences.english: Straight life insipid, flavors and taste of life twists and turns.
sentences.chinese: 平直的生活淡而無味，曲折的生活五味俱全。

sentences.english: Objective Setting up HPLC finger-print chromatogram of decoction of Schisandra chinensis.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立五味子水煎物的HPLC指紋圖譜。

sentences.english: Schisandra is Chinese traditional medicinal materials.
sentences.chinese: 五味子屬植物是我國傳統的中藥材。

sentences.english: Objective To study the microwave assisted extraction process of Schisandra chinensis(Turcz)Baill.
sentences.chinese: 目的微波輔助萃取五味子的提取工藝。

sentences.english: Looking into their eyes, I felt like bottles of condiment spilled over in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 看着這些孩子的眼睛，我的心裏好像打翻了五味瓶。

sentences.english: The life, is all flavors cup of water.
sentences.chinese: 生活，是五味俱全的一杯水。

sentences.english: Methods Polysaccharide in Schisandra chinensis (Turcz) Baill Fruit was determined by the method of Spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用比色法測定北五味子中多糖含量。

sentences.english: To study the optimal water extraction technology of polysaccharide from ethanol-insoluble residue of Schisandra.
sentences.chinese: 研究工業五味子醇提殘渣中多糖的提取工藝。

sentences.english: Everybody speak of to all of fellings is five flavours bottle.
sentences.chinese: 每個人說起來感覺都是五味瓶。

sentences.english: Would you like some flavors that make your mouth come alive something to let your mouth on fire?
sentences.chinese: 你想讓你的嘴變成炒勺嗎？五味雜陳，如火如荼。

sentences.english: Fruit of Chinesemagnoliavine wooden fat element soft capsule developmentimprovementabove many questions.
sentences.chinese: 五味子木脂素軟膠囊的研製改善上述的諸多問題。

sentences.english: The functions of SCP in reducing weight and fat were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了北五味子多糖的降脂減肥作用。

sentences.english: Father be beneath the human character, let me down to the extreme, the inner five mixed.
sentences.chinese: 父親的不近人情，讓我失望到了極點，內心五味雜陳。

sentences.english: Schisandra chinensis is the genuine medicinal plant in northeast china.
sentences.chinese: 北五味子是東北三省重要的地道藥材。

definition: a complete gamut of all five flavors (idiom); every flavor under the sun
five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]

seven emotional states/seven affects of traditional Chinese medical theory and therapy, namely: joy 喜[xi3], anger 怒[nu4], anxiety 憂|忧[you1], thought 思[si1], grief 悲[bei1], fear 恐[kong3], fright 驚|惊[jing1]/seven relations

(TCM) six bowels (hollow organs), namely: gall bladder 膽|胆[dan3], stomach 胃[wei4], large intestine 大腸|大肠[da4 chang2], small intestine 小腸|小肠[xiao3 chang2], triple heater 三焦[san1 jiao1], bladder 膀胱[pang2 guang1]
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
five crops, e.g. millet 粟[su4], soybean 豆[dou4], sesame 麻[ma2], barley 麥|麦[mai4], rice 稻[dao4] or other variants/all crops/all grains/oats, peas, beans and barley
(TCM) the three truncal cavities (thoracic, abdominal and pelvic), known as the "triple heater" or "San Jiao"
